text: Isaac Mercer may refer to: * Isaac Mercer (1910–2002), Newfoundland lawyer and politician * Isaac Mercer (Bay de Verde), who represented Bay de Verde in the Newfoundland assembly from 1902 to 1904 * Isaac Mercer (died 1860), whose murder led to a ban on the practice of mummering in Newfoundland
title: Isaac Mercer (disambiguation)
